And it is already possible that on this type incision be made and on the other flesh; and it is that you cut the skin of the genitals, and then extend the egg to the upper parts, and extract it from the white membrane, and free the suspensory of the vessels, and tie them, and cut the suspensory after you free it from every part of the parts of the egg.

Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.
So if the egg is already consolidated with those fleshy parts, then it is appropriate that you extract the egg and cut it.

E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.
And if there is adherence to some part of the membrane, or between that which is between the vessels, then it is appropriate that you free all that adherence and cut it by round incision.

Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.
But if there is growth of flesh in the place of the adherence which is behind, then it is appropriate that you cut all that which is of it, and extract the egg as we have said.

Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.
So when your operation is completed, then fill the wound with wool soaked in rose oil and wine; and then treat it with the other treatment until it is healed.

Capitol .lxiv.
Chapter 64.

De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.
On the treatment of hernia that is of the scrotum.

Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.
Scrotal hernia is a swelling wrapped by some covering similar to a bud with softening of the testicles, and it makes difficult exercise movement and walking for the patient.

E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.
And in the treatment of this disease there is fear because of which remembrance precedes.

Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.
However, it is appropriate that we speak of the operation on it according to what the ancients did.

E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.
And I say that it is appropriate that you make the patient sit on a raised chair; and then push the suspension of the testicles to the lower parts; and then hold the skin of the genitals with your fingers with the vessels that are close to the penis; and let another minister hold those than you, and extend them with vigorous extension.

E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.
And then incise with a wide sharp spatula by transverse section in the right of the vessels until the vessels are uncovered.

E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.
And then flay from every part as we have told you in the extraction of arteries which are in the temples.

E aprop fica en aquelas un'agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.
And then stick in those a needle in which there is a double thread, and tie that in the first of the places in which the scrotum is affected, and tie that again in the last of them.

E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.
And then incise those in the middle place by straight section according to the length of the body, and extract that which is gathered of foul and corrupt humors.

E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.
And then cure the wound with treatment of other wounds in which you want healing to be generated so that the vessels which nourish one of the two genitals fall, for it is not bad for that.

Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.
But if the scrotum affects all the vessels, then it is appropriate that the testicles be extracted or that the testicles for that dry up with the vessels, so that it is deprived of all nourishment by the incision of the vessels, and that they be destroyed, or that they dry up so that there is no benefit with them.

Capitol .lxv.
Chapter 65.

De la cura de hernia entestinal.
On the cure of intestinal hernia.

Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.
The advent of this hernia is by a cut that happens in the peritoneum extended over the belly from the part of the groins of the abdominal wall, through which the intestines descend from that rupture to some of the intestines.

E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.
And this rupture is either of the peritoneum or of extension of it, and these two species happen for many causes: either percussion, or by jumps, or by clamor, or by lifting of some heavy thing, or by similar things.

E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.
And the sign of that, when it is by extension of the peritoneum, is that it happens little by little over a long time, and does not happen suddenly, and is an even swelling down to the depth because the peritoneum compresses the intestine.

E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.
And the sign of it is when it is by cutting of the peritoneum, for at the beginning it makes violent pain happen suddenly; and it is a diverse swelling appearing under the nearby skin appearing, and that is by exit of the intestine, and the body of it to the outside parts of the peritoneum.

E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.
And sometimes the membrane is thrown out with the intestine, and this intestinal hernia is called omental.

E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.
And sometimes it is made with windiness, and sometimes a crack runs in the intestine, and there it is retained, and with that there is great danger for the patient, and sometimes it makes evil pain happen and especially when it is pressed.

E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.
And in the treatment of the types of this disease with iron there is fear, so it is advisable to avoid falling into it.

E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.
And the manner of operation for this is that you order the patient to reduce the intestine with his hand to the inner parts of his cavity if it obeys its return, and afterwards he is laid on his neck between your hands, and you raise his legs.

E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.
And then stretch the skin which follows the skin of the testicles to the upper parts, and cut the skin of the testicles all along the length; and then fix in two lips of the section hooks according to what you need to open the section with them.

E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.
And let the section be according to the quantity that is possible for you that from it the egg is thrown out.

E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.
And then skin that ciphaqueth which is below the skin of the testicles, until the white hard ciphac is uncovered on each side.

Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.
Then you insert your finger into what follows the testicle, into what is between white ciphac, which is under the skin of the egg, and between the second ciphac, and loosen with that adherence which is in the back part of the egg.

E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.
And then move with the hand the skin of the testicles to the outer parts, and with this extend the white ciphac upwards with the left hand, and raise the egg with the ciphac to the part of the section; and order the minister to extend the egg upwards and you dissolve the adherence that is behind with complete solution.

E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.
And search with your fingers that there is no cause of the intestine wrapped in the hard white ciphac.

Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.
But if you find any cause of it, then you push it to the belly below.

E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.
And then you take a needle in which there is a thick thread made of 10 threads, and insert it towards the back of the ciphac, which is under the skin of the testicles, which follows the section; and then cut the extremities which protrude from the thread until there are four threads, and then compose some of them over some figure in the manner of a cross; and tie with that the ciphac of which we have said that it is under the skin of the testicles with a strong binding of two parts.

E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.
And then wrap the extremities of the threads and tie them with vehement binding until some of the vessels that nourish them cannot transmit anything so that a hot abscess does not occur from there.

E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.
And place another binding according to outside the first binding, far from it less than three fingers; and after these two bindings leave of the ciphac which is under the skin of the testicles the quantity of the size of the finger, and cut all the remainder according to roundness, and remove the egg from it.

E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.
And then cut in the lower part of the skin of the testicles by a section from which blood and pus run as we have recounted in what we have said.

E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.
And then administer wool submerged in oil, and place in the wound; and administer the binding which we have recounted (and sometimes the white ciphac is cauterized, which we have said after the cutting of it fearing blood flow, for many times it happens to them) and leave the binding until it falls by itself.

Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.
But if its falling is delayed, then let it be sprinkled with hot water, and place over it until it falls as we have said.

E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.
And then treat the wound with the other treatment of wounds until it is healed.

Capitol .lxvi.
Chapter 66.

De hernia ventosa.
On windy hernia.

En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.
In this hernia I have not seen anyone who has been brave about treating it with iron.

E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.
And the first ones said that it is done as we have recounted in the hernia that is with wine; which is that you tie the vessels after the section over it with its ease; and then dry in the middle place around the abscess with what opens it, until the vessels fall.

E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.
And treat the wound as we have said until it is healed.

Capitol .lxvii.
Chapter 67.

De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.
About the rupture that occurs in the groin.

Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.
Sometimes a rupture occurs in the groin as we have said, and the area swells.

E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.
And nothing from the intestines descends to the genitals; and if it does descend, it's very little; and it returns at all times.

Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.
But if the condition is prolonged, a fissure is added in the peritoneum until the intestine descends into the peritoneum; and this happens due to the extension of the peritoneum which is in the groin as we have said, which is because the peritoneum is stretched, and afterwards it softens and the area becomes swollen and protrudes.

E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.
And the cure for it is with cautery as has been previously narrated.

E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.
And sometimes it is cured with iron in this manner: the patient lies on his back between your hands, and then dry the area of the rupture of the swollen parts with an incision across the width of about three fingers.

E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.
And then tighten the white peritoneum that is under the skin until it is exposed.

E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.
And then take the probe and place it on the protruding part of the peritoneum, and press it into the depth of the belly.

E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.
And then sew the two protruding places over the end of the probe of the peritoneum, and join them together with sutures.

E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.
And then extract the end of the probe, and do not cut the peritoneum completely, nor extend the egg, nor anything else as I have informed you in the treatment of intestinal hernia.

E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.
And then treat it with the treatment for wounds, and when you cut the threads, clean it and restore the wound until it is healed; because the peritoneum is contracted and the protrusion of the rupture is not joined.

E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.
And cautery is better in this place, as it is closer to health.

Capitol .lxviii.
Chapter 68.

De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.
About softening of the skin of the testicles.

Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.
Many times the skin of the testicles in some men is softened because the flesh between them is softened, and its appearance is ugly.

Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.
Then it is necessary for the one who is asked to cure it to make the patient lie on his back, and cut all the skin which is softened above the natural skin; and then join the two lips with sutures.

E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.
And if you want, sew at the beginning the excess of the softened skin with three or four stitches and with firm sutures.

E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.
And then cut between the sutures; and then treat it with the treatment for other wounds until it is healed and the threads fall out.

Capitol .lxix.
Chapter 69.

De castracio.
About castration.

Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.
Know that castration in our law is excommunicated, but for a reason it is allowed for me to remember it in this book; and the remembrance of it is only necessary for two reasons, of which one is so that it may be in the knowledge of the doctor when he is asked about it, that he may know the cure for one to whom it happens; and the other reason is that we often have need of castration of other animals for our benefit through them, such as rams, and goats, and pigs, and similar animals.

E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.
And so I say that castration is done in two ways: either by crushing, or by fissure or cutting.

Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.
But in that which is done by crushing, the way of the operation is that we make the animal sit in hot water until its genitals are softened and are slippery and hang down.

E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.
And then take them with your hand until they are dissolved and do not appear under the touch.

Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.
But in castration done by fissure and cutting, it is necessary that you hold the animal and press the skin of its testicles with the left hand.

E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.
And then tie the suspensory, and cut over each egg with one cut until the two eggs come out.

E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.
And then cut them after you have skinned each one.

E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.
And do not leave on them any of the peritoneum, except the thin peritoneum which is over the vessels.

E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.
And this manner of castration is better which is done by crushing, because crushing very easily leaves some of the testicles so that the animal desires coitus.

E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.
And then treat the wound until it is healed.

Capitol .lxx.
Chapter 70

De la cura de hermafrodozia.
On the treatment of hermaphroditism.

Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.
Hermaphroditism in men is of two types: one is when it appears in what follows the space in the skin of the testicles, in that which is between two testicles, resembling a woman's genitals in which there is hair.

E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.
And sometimes urine flows from that which is in the skin of the testicles.

Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.
But in women there is one type: and it is that the woman's genitals above the pubic area are like two male testicles, a little bit diminished on the outside part, like the foreskin of a man and two testicles.

E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.
And the treatment is of three types: two for men and one type for women.

E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.
And it is that you should cut those joined flesh until the impression of it disappears, and afterwards treat those with the treatment of other wounds.

E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.
And in the second type of men from which urine flows, which is in the skin of the testicles, there is no treatment or operation for it.

Capitol .xxi.
Chapter 71

De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.
On lentigo and prominent flesh in women's parts.

Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.
Lentigo is easily added to natural parts until it is stretched and the appearance becomes ugly; and sometimes it is enlarged in some women so much that it is spread out as in men and reaches to coitus.

Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.
Then you should hold the excess of lentigo with your hand or with a hook and cut it.

E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.
And do not go too far in cutting, especially in the depth of the root, so that bleeding does not occur.

E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.
And afterwards treat it with the treatment of wounds until it is healed.

Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.
But grown flesh is flesh that grows in the orifice of the womb until it fills it, and it easily comes out to the outer parts in the shape of a tail (and for this reason some early [physicians] called this "tail disease"); therefore we should cut it as we cut lentigo, and treat it until it is healed.

Capitol .lxxii.
Chapter 72

De curacio de alratica.
On the treatment of atresia.

Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.
Atresia is when the woman's genitals are not perforated, or the hole is small.

E es o natural o accidental.
And it is either natural or accidental.

Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.
Accidental is from a disease which has preceded, and that is made either by grown flesh added or by thin or thick membrane.

E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.
And it is made either in the depth of the womb, or in its sides, or in its uppermost part, or in its lowest part, and it prevents coitus and conception and childbirth, and often prevents menstruation.

E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.
And the diagnosis of it is made by the midwife's inspection, if the obstruction is apparent, nearby; but if it is not apparent, then you search for it with your fingers or with the probe.

Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.
But if the obstruction is by thin membrane, and is close to the two labia, then you hurry and break it.

E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.
And it is that you place pledgets on the two labia, and afterwards place your index fingers of both hands together.

E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.
And the woman should be on her back, her thighs extended, and afterwards extend the two labia forcefully until that thin membrane is broken and the obstruction is opened.

E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.
And afterwards take wool and soak it in oil and place it on the spot, and she should lie with a man that day so that the cut place does not heal.

Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.
But if the membrane is large and thick, then you should cut it with a broad spatula or with a myrtle leaf.

Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.
But if the obstruction is by grown flesh, then suspend it with a hook, and cut it.

E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.
And you should have with you medicines that stop bleeding without irritation, such as acacia, and dragon's blood, and incense, mixed with egg white.

E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.
And afterwards administer a wide lead cannula so that the wound does not heal too quickly.

E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.
And keep it for some days and administer dry flax tow.

E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.
And afterwards it should be treated with the other healing treatment until it is healed.

E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.
And sometimes other flesh growths occur in the womb, and then you should cut according to this method.

Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.
But if this is due to a cancerous abscess, the cancerous abscess which is in the womb should not be opposed with iron in any way.

Capitol .lxxiii.
Chapter 73.

De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.
On the treatment of hemorrhoids and cuts and red swellings that occur in women's genitals.

Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.
Hemorrhoids are swellings of the orifices of many veins from which much blood flows continuously; and when hemorrhoids are old, they become cuts.

E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.
And I have already spoken in the division about their types and signs, and I will say here which ones can be cured and which ones cannot be cured.

Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.
Therefore I say that hemorrhoids and cuts when they are deep in the womb and not visible to the senses, then in those no treatment should be done with iron.

Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.
But those which are at the orifice of the womb, on which sensation falls, are those that are cured.

E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.
And it is appropriate that you put the woman in a warm house and afterwards extend the skin with scissors, or with rough cloth, and cut those at the roots.

E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.
And afterwards sprinkle over those where the blood flows one of the cutting powders without irritation, such as acacia and similar to those.

E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.
And afterwards raise her feet for an hour, and afterwards place her in cold water.

E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.
And if the blood flow persists, then make her sit in a decoction of sumac and pomegranate peels and galls and similar things.

E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.
And afterwards take barley flour and mix it with honey and vinegar and make a plaster with this on her back.

E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.
And if the blood is stopped, it is good; and if not, apply two cups to the breasts without scarification.

E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.
And afterwards take wool and submerge it in coriander juice or in plantain juice or in carob juice with diluted wine and apply to the place; and afterwards treat the place with ointments until it is healed.

Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.
But a red swelling which has a rough appearance, it is appropriate that you cut what appears to you of that according to what I have said about cuts equally.

E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.
And treat that until it is healed.

Capitol .lxxiv.
Chapter 74.

De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.
On perforation of an opening occurring in the womb.

Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.
Many types of swellings occur in the womb, such as cancer and stone-like swellings and ulcerations and adhesions and herpetic conditions and fistulas hemorrhoids and ragades and cuts and other swellings.

E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.
And I have already spoken of these illnesses and their types and their signs, and their treatments in the division.

E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.
And it is appropriate that I speak in this treatise of hot swelling which comes in the womb when it is of the swellings that collect pus, and if you want to know in what manner the operation on it is done with iron.

Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.
Then it is appropriate that you consider if the pain of the swelling in its beginning is acute with percussion and phlegm and fever, and you see it redden and if sensation falls on it, then do not hurry with perforation of it, and treat it with that which helps with maturation until the acuteness of the symptoms ceases.

E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.
And then it is appropriate that you make the woman sit on a seat that has two seats; and recline on her back and bring her feet to the lower part of the belly, and her thighs should be spread, and place her arms under her knees, and tie each with a binding appropriate to this.

E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.
And afterwards the midwife should follow from the right side and administer the instrument with which the orifice of the womb is opened, the form of which will come in those things that will be done afterwards.

E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.
And it is appropriate when you want to administer this instrument that you insert with the probe the depth of the woman's womb, and that which of the instrument has entered the womb should not be more than the depth of the womb and injure the patient.

Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.
But if the instrument is larger than the depth of the womb, then it is appropriate that you place pads on the texture of the depth of the womb so that the entry of the whole instrument into the depth of the womb is prevented.

E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.
It is necessary that you place the instrument on the upper side and that the minister holds the instrument and turns it until the orifice of the womb is opened.

E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.
And when the swelling appears, and is touched by hand and is smooth and soft, then it is necessary that you cut it towards the head with a wide spatula.

E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.
And when the blood is evacuated, then it is necessary that you place in the wound a wick soaked in rose oil or green oil in which there is some astringency; and place the compress in the incision in the depth of the womb.

E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.
And place outside the womb and over the pubic area clean wool soaked in water in which mallows have been boiled.

E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.
And afterwards it should be treated after two days with an ointment which is suitable for this until it is healed.

E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.
And sometimes the womb and the wound are washed so that it is treated with water and honey, and afterwards with water in which lily root or long aristolochia has been boiled, and afterwards return to the ointment.

E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.
And if the wound is hidden inside the womb, then it is necessary that you are prohibited from treating it with iron, having care for it with what we have said in the division.

Capitol .lxxv.
Chapter 75.

A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.
To teach midwives in what manner living embryos should be treated when they come out in an unnatural position.

Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.
It is necessary that the midwife knows at the beginning the signs of natural childbirth, and it is that when you see the woman pushing in the lower parts and desiring to smell the air, and moreover is relieved by what is above her of the birth, and hastens the exit of the embryo, then know that this birth is according to natural position, and its exit is on its head, and the placenta with it or suspended or hanging from the navel.

Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.
Therefore when you see these signs, then it is necessary that her belly be compressed so that the embryo descends easily because when it descends on its head, the placenta descends to it, and it is cleansed of those superfluities with good cleansing.

Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.
But that which is other than this birth is unnatural and not praiseworthy, because when the embryo has come out on its feet and its body has come out before its head and its feet, and one of its hands, or to one of its feet, or its head has come out and its hand, or to its belly, and very easily it is turned on its neck, and similar to its undesirable positions.

Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.
Therefore it is necessary for the midwife to be wise and subtle in all these things, and to guard against error and deception.

E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.
And I am showing every position of these, and what skill is in these so that it may be signified by this and may have been upon this.

Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.
When the fetus has come out on its head by natural egress, and that is vehement on the woman and difficult birth is made to it, and you see its strength already weakened, then make her sit, or have the women hold her, and steam her vagina with cooked fenugreek and with moist oils.

E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.
And afterwards let the midwife introduce between her fingers a small spatula and split with it the placenta, or cut it with her nail until what is in it of moisture runs out.

E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.
And press the woman's belly until the fetus descends.

Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.
But if it does not descend, then it is necessary that the woman be given an enema of psyllium mucilage and fenugreek mucilage with sesame.

E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.
And afterwards command her, after the enema, that she be compressed and make her sneeze with hellebore; and hold her mouth and her nose for an hour, because the fetus will be expelled soon.

E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.
And if the two hands of the fetus are expelled at the beginning, then it is necessary that you reduce them with a little facility little by little.

Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.
But if it does not obey to enter, then place the woman on a chair and raise her feet up, and afterwards shake the chair on the ground; and the woman should be held so that she does not fall towards the shaking.

E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.
And if the hands are not turned inside and the fetus dies, then cut them and extract the remainder of the fetus or tie its body to its hand with a cloth and extract it with evenness, because it will be expelled.

De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.
On the exit of the embryo on its feet.

Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.
When the fetus exits on its feet, then you should push those upwards, and then turn the small fetus, and then straighten it, and then take one of its feet and extend those little by little.

Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.
But when they have exited up to the thighs, then you command it to push, and make it sneeze with care, for it will be expelled if God wills it.

E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.
And if it is not expelled with what we have recounted, then you return the fetus little by little until you place it according to its natural position, for it will then be expelled with an easy exit.

E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.
And if it is prevented with all that we have recounted, then take marshmallow mucilage and dissolved gum, and pound all in the mortar with good pounding, and then anoint with this the woman's genitals, and the lower part of her belly.

E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.
And then make her sit in lukewarm water, until it reaches the hypochondria.

E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.
And when you see that the parts below her are softened, then give her a fumigation of myrtle and place it under her.

E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.
And when you have fumigated for an hour, then make her sit on a chair, and then make her sneeze and close her mouth, and lift her, and press the lower part of her belly with light compression, for the fetus will soon be expelled.

Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.
Exit of the fetus on its knees and its hands.

Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.
When the fetus exits in this form, then you should maneuver by introducing its hands little by little; and then the woman should lie on her back, and her feet should hang down, and she should be lying on the bed, and fold her hands.

E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.
And then press on her belly little by little, and then extract what is below her feet from the ears until it is prepared in the lowest part.

E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.
And if the fetus is not expelled, then take her feet and move them with vigorous movement, and then press what is above the hypochondria little by little until the fetus rises to the upper parts.

E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.
And then introduce its hands and straighten the fetus little by little, and command the woman to push until the fetus is expelled.

Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.
Exit of the fetus laterally with one of its hands hanging.

Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.
Try to reduce its hand, but if you cannot reduce it, then lift the woman and make her walk.

E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.
And if she cannot walk, then make her lie on the bed, and shake her thighs with vigorous shaking, and then administer the bindings which I have recounted of mucilages.

E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.
And if childbirth has come, then make her sit on a chair, and then work on reducing the hand, and straighten the fetus according to its natural position, and make the woman sneeze and command her to push herself until it is expelled.

Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.
Exit of the fetus on its neck with its hands spread and its face to its mother's back.

Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.
The midwife should hold the fetus's hand and then turn it little by little, and equalize it with ease.

E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.
And when it is and how much it is straightened, then place on her genitals what we have recounted of oil and mucilages.

E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.
And then command her to move little by little, and when you have done this, then make her sit on a chair and command her to be inclined on the right side, and then command her to push; and make her sneeze with care.

Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.
Exit of the fetus prepared on its side.

Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.
When it descends to the mother's orifice in this manner, consider, and then you cut the afterbirth with your nail until it is evacuated of moisture.

E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.
And if the fetus is suspended on its face and neck, then you cut it from the navel, so that it is not retained and dies.

E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.
And then push the fetus to the inner parts until you place it as is appropriate, and order the woman to push herself several times, and it will be expelled with an easy exit, if God wills it.

Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.
Exit of twins or multiple fetuses.

Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.
Know that twins are often born, and sometimes three or four are born, but this is strange and rarely happens; but five are unnatural, and do not live.

E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.
And count them, even if they are multiplied, as one pregnancy, and they are separated by the membrane, distinguishing them between the ligament in the navel of each one. And sometimes they are expelled as is one fetus by natural easy exit, and sometimes they are expelled by undesirable exit as we have recounted.

E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.
And if some of them are difficult during childbirth and come to what we have said of unnatural figures, then you cure them as we have recounted.

E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.
And let the midwife be subtle and do what she does with ease and subtlety, and with slowness, and be ingenious according to every figure as is prepared for her from the skill bringing to health.

Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.
Remembrance of what is formed in the womb from embryos and abortions.

Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.
Sometimes one, and two, and three, and four, and five, and six, and seven, and more than ten are formed in the mother, and it has been verified to me that a woman aborted and expelled six, and another ten all formed, which thing was done by measurement of the glorious wise men.

E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.
And all this should be in the knowledge of the midwife for it very easily appears similar to her, and thus opposes itself to that with what is appropriate.

Capitol .lxxvi.
Chapter 76.

De extraccio del fet quan es mort.
On extraction of the fetus when it is dead.

Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.
When you cure the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of medication and it has not come out, and you are forced to use operation by hand, then it is appropriate that you consider if the woman is of sound virtue and is not with any of the accidents by which loss is feared over her.

Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.
Then it is appropriate that the woman be laid on the bed on her back, and let her head be inclined downwards and her thighs be elevated.

E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.
And the minister holds her from two parts or she is tied to the bed so that her body does not extend towards the extraction of the fetus.

E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.
And after you moisten the mouth of her womb with moist oils and with mucilage of marshmallow and fenugreek and linseed.

E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.
And after the midwife anoints her hand with those oils and mucilages, and after introduces her hand with ease into the womb, and after searches with the hand for a place in which to fix the hooks in the fetus.

E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.
And convenient places for this: then you consider if the fetus is prepared to descend on its head, and then you fix the hooks in its eyes, or in the neck, or in the mouth, or in the palate, or under the chin, or in its fork, or in the places near the ribs, or under the hypochondria.

Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.
But if the descent is over its feet, then in the pubic area, or in the middle of the ribs.

E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.
And it is appropriate that she hold the hook with the right hand, and place its curve in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, and introduce the hand with ease and fix the hook in some of those places which we have said, until it reaches the empty thing.

E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.
And after place and fix in its apposition another hook, or the third if it is necessary, so that there is equal attraction, and there is not extension according to its straightness only.

Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.
Rather it is moved to every part, so that its exit is eased as is done in tooth towards its eradication.

E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.
And it is appropriate in it that which is between them that the extension be softened; and if some part of it is retained, then it is appropriate that the midwife anoint some of her fingers with oil and introduce them expertly and revolve with them that which is retained.

Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.
Thus if the part of the fetus is expelled, then the hooks are changed to a place which is higher; and do this until all the fetus is expelled.

Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.
But if the hand has come out before the other, and it is not possible to reduce it due to its constriction, then it is appropriate that cloth be wrapped over it; and after extract it until it is all expelled, and cut it either at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.

E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.
And so it is fitting that you do this with the other hand and with both feet.

Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat "alundat", la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.
But if the head of the fetus is large, or there is constriction during the exit, or there is water gathered in the head, then it is fitting to insert between the fingers a spiny spatula and split the head and extract the water, or to uncover it with an instrument which is called "alundat", the form of which will come with the forms of other instruments in the chapter which is after this one.

E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.
And similarly do if the fetus has a large head by nature: and then it is fitting to incise it with a scalpel, or to take it with the alunda as we have said; and afterwards extract the bones with forceps.

E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.
And if the head has exited and is constricted towards the clavicle, then let it be split until the fluid which is in the chest is poured out.

Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.
But if it is not complicated, nor obeys to exit, then you incise the head as soon as it will be possible for you.

E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.
And if the lower part of the belly is swollen or is in dropsy, then it is fitting that you perforate it until the fluid that is in it runs out.

Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.
But if the fetus is on its feet, then the attraction of it is easy and the direction of it to the mouth of the womb is easy.

Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.
But if it is constricted towards the belly and chest, then it is fitting that you extract it with a cloth which you will have wrapped over your hand, and that you split the belly and chest until that which is in them runs out.

Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.
But if the other members are removed and the head returns, then let the midwife insert the left hand; but if the mouth of the womb is open, then let her insert the hand into the depth of the air, and search with it for the head, and draw it with the fingers to the mouth of the womb, and afterwards insert into it one hook, or two hooks, and draw it with those.

E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.
And if the mouth of the womb is constricted by hot swelling which happens to it, then it is fitting that it not be troubled over; rather it is fitting then to administer an effusion of fatty moist things.

E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.
And administer plasters; and follow the patient in waters that soften and moisten.

E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.
And if the fetus is on its side, then if it is possible, let it be needled: and let that which we have said be administered in the living fetus.

E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.
And if that is not possible, then let it be cut into pieces, and let it be extracted.

E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.
And it is fitting that you do not leave anything inside of the afterbirth.

E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.
And when you will have completed all your operation, then administer that which we have said of the cure in the hot swellings which happen to the womb.

E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.
And if flux of blood happens, then descend into styptic waters and administer the other cure.

E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.
And I have already seen a woman in whose womb was a dead fetus, and afterwards upon that she was again pregnant, and afterwards the other fetus was dead.

Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.
It happened to her after a long time a swelling in her navel; and it swelled until it was opened, and began to discharge pus.

E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.
And I was called to the cure of it, and medicated it for a long time, and the wound was not consolidated.

Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.
Then I placed upon it some things, a plaster of strong attraction, and a bone came out of it, and after some days passed, and another bone came out; and I was very amazed, as in the belly there is no bone.

E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.
And then I thought that they were from the bones of the dead fetus.

Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.
Therefore I widened the wound, and extracted from it many bones, the woman existing in her best dispositions, and already lived in such a manner for a long time, a little pus ran from it.

E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.
And I do not affirm this to be strange, except that in this is science and help to that which the skilled physician administers with the hand for cure.

De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.
On the forms of instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.

Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:
Form of a speculum with which the womb is opened:

Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.
This is the form of a clamp in which the books are equalized, to which equalization are two screws at the two extremities of two pieces of wood.

May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.
However, this screw should be more subtle than a writing instrument, and be made either of yew or boxwood.

E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.
And the width of each piece of wood is about two fingers and the margin of each both about one finger, and the length of each is one and a half palms; and in the middle place of the two pieces of wood are two additions of the same wood which are already fastened, of which the length is half a palm and a little more, and the width of each is about two fingers, or a little more.

E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.
And these two additions should be inserted into the mouth of the womb so that it is opened with them when you turn the two aforementioned screws.

Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:
Another form similar to that one, more subtle and lighter:

Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.
It should be made of yew wood or boxwood according to the likeness of forceps.

Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.
But at the extremity of it are two additions as you see, and the length of those additions is about one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.

E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.
And when you want to open the womb with them, then you make the woman sit on the bed with feet hanging, opening what is between her thighs.

E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.
And afterwards open your hand with the instrument as you do with scissors equally according to the quantity you want of the opening of the mouth of the womb until the midwife does what you want.

La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:
The form of speculum which the ancients described:

Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:
Form of impeller with which the fetus is impelled:

Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran
Form of large amisidat with which the large head is crushed

E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.
And it is similar to forceps which have teeth at the extremity, as you see, and sometimes it is made long like forceps according to this form, as you see, which have teeth like the teeth of a saw with which it is cut and crushed.

Forma de amesidat pauc:
Form of small amesidat:

Forma de unci havent una spina:
Form of hook having one spine:

Forma de unci havent doas spinas:
Form of hook having two spines:

Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:
Form of forceps which have saw teeth with which the head of the fetus is crushed:

Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:
Form of spatula having two extremities with which the head is cut off:

Forma de dos espatums latz:
Form of two wide spatulas:

Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.
All these instruments are exercised, and the more the species of it are multiplied and are prepared by the craftsmen, the easier it is for its operation and the higher it is for men by its quantity.

E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.
And do not work with these instruments even if it is prepared for you, because the necessity of them is not excusable.

De extraccio de la segondina.
On extraction of the placenta.

Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.
When the placenta is retained after childbirth, then you should command the patient to hold her breath, and afterwards make her sneeze with condizi, and press your hand over her mouth and over her nostrils, and if by this it has come out, it is good.

E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.
And if not, then take a pot and perforate a hole in the lid and put in it herbs opening the mouth of the womb, such as calamint and rue and anise and chamomile and Arabian sticados and cassia lignea and centaury.

Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.
All these herbs or some of them should be submerged in water in the pot, and place it over the fire.

E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.
And afterwards place a reed tube in the mouth of the womb, and hold it until the vapor comes to the cavity of the womb.

E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.
And afterwards make her sneeze as we have said, and the placenta will be expelled with velocity.

Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.
But if it remains after this cure and has not come out, then you command the midwife to submerge her left hand in sesame oil or in marsh mallow mucilage, and afterwards insert it into the vagina and search for the placenta with it, and when you have found it, then take it and extend it little by little. But if it is attached in the depth of the womb, then insert her hand as we have recounted, and when she has found the placenta, extract it little by little according to straightness so that the womb does not fall towards the vehement attraction.

Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.
First, it is necessary that it be moved to the right and left sides with ease.

E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.
And afterwards it should be adjusted in the amount of attraction, for it will obey and evade adhesion.

E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.
And if the mother's mouth is constricted, we have already recounted the cure with sneezing and with medication of the pot with herbs.

Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.
But if it is not expelled with all the things which we have recounted, then be careful not to tire yourself with repeated attempts at extraction, but instead it is necessary that what has come out of it to the mother's mouth be tied to the woman's thigh, and afterwards apply an ointment and tetrapharmacon to her; for that will cause it to rot after a few days and it will be dissolved and expelled.

Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.
But when it rots, a bad odor rises from it to the head and stomach, and this harms the patient; and then it is necessary that fumigations suitable for this be administered.

Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.
But some of the Ancients have already tried fumigation with watercress and dried figs.

Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:
Form of instrument with which the woman is fumigated for the retention of menses and of the afterbirth:

Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.
It should be made of glass or copper.

E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.
And the thin end should be placed in the vagina and the wide end over the fire, and the fumigation should be placed on the embers of the fire.

E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.
And hold it until that fumigation is consumed and repeat with another.

De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.
On the cure of an infant's unpierced anus.

Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.
Many infants are born and their anuses are not pierced, which have a thin and blocked membrane.

Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.
Then it is necessary for the midwife to pierce that membrane with her finger; and if not, pierce it with a sharp spatula, and be careful not to touch the muscle.

E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.
And afterwards place wool soaked in wine and oil on it; and afterwards treat it with ointment until it is healed.

Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.
But if you fear it may be blocked, then place a cannula in the hole for many days, and remove it when the child wants to defecate.

E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.
And obstruction of the anus can occur through healing of a wound or abscess; then it is necessary that this healed area be cut open, and afterwards be treated with what we have said about the cure and the lead.

De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.
On the cure of fistulas that occur below.

Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.
The fistulas that occur in the lower part are nodules and swellings which occur near the anus outside or in the space of one part.

E es una fistula o motas.
And it is one fistula or many.
